title: Brush techniques
brief_description: This is the second of a series of films on water colour painting which have been made in collaboration with Eliot O’Hara; the companion film, the first in the series, is “Painting reflections in water”. In “Brush techniques”, O’Hara executes a water colour sketch in order to demonstrate how he communicates his impression of a landscape to whose who view his paintings.
